title: VPFL Competition #2
author: VD
content_html:
What Vikings fan was murdered by NFL referees in 1975? No Googling, just answer the question if you know it. Tie-breaker: name the instrument of righteous retribution which soon dropped from the skies.

I will announce the draft date soon. We still need to have a discussion about keepers, so if you want to share your thoughts, do so now. How many, etc.
